entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Freezing rain beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
